plot: John returns home to his father, after 30 years, to discover there is a dark family secret that will change his life forever.
title: To The Devil His Due
plot_es: John returns home to his father, after 30 years, to discover there is a dark family secret that will change his life forever.
plot_en: John returns home to his father, after 30 years, to discover there is a dark family secret that will change his life forever.
